name: Pokémon Gold and Silver 97: Reforged
storyline:
Features:

All Spaceworld sprites have been created from scratch or edited from either the final game or from Spaceworld ‘97 itself (Or borrowed from ’99’s) to match the final GBC style
The overworld is now in color.
Gold and Silver versions with different sprites and differing encounter rates
Lugia has been added back for Silver’s Version
Recreated title screen from Spaceworld ‘97
Pokémon movesets have been altered for the better
Added more trainers to improve Gen 2’s level curve
Edited Trainer’s Pokémon
Added Female Player functionality back
Edited Spaceworld maps to make more sense (Kanto especially)
Edited various events
Changed Elite Four
Battle tower from Crystal
Added extra areas to explore
summary: Gold and Silver 97: Reforged is a totally new re-imagining of the world from the 1997 Spaceworld demo of Pokémon Gold and Silver. Featuring an entirely new campaign and story through the Nihon Region based on all of Japan. Graphics have been totally overhauled to match the look and feel of the final 1999 release of Pokémon GSC, and gameplay spruced up with lots of entirely new content and places to explore.
